summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Chatbot with Claude Sonnet 4.5. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), Streamlit UI functional with excellent chat experience, context memory working correctly, and MongoDB persistence verified. Minor UI issue with delete buttons identified.
